display.description: Iterates over each item in `list`, in parallel. Note, that since it iterates over each item in parallel, there is no guarantee of completion order.
display.label: Each

properties.description: List of items to iterate over.
properties.label: List of items
properties.name: list

properties.description: The name of the item variable.
properties.label: Item Var
properties.name: itemVar

properties.description: The name of the index variable.
properties.label: Item Index
properties.name: itemIndex

taskProperties.description: The task or task dispatcher to use.
taskProperties.name: iteratee
